Title: Corner Bowl Popup Help Control
Description: Provides a simple help icon developers can place next to a control which enables users to mouse over and popup context sensitive help.  The popup Windows are similar to tooltips found within Microsoft Office products.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Provides a simple help icon developers can place next to a control which enables users to mouse over and popup context sensitive help. The popup Windows are similar to tooltips found within Microsoft Office products.
